args.content:
import Mathlib

theorem dirichlet_bounded_variation (x Î» : â„• â†’ â„)
  (h_bound : âˆƒ M, âˆ€ n, |(âˆ‘ i in Finset.range (n+1), x i)| â‰¤ M)
  (hÎ» : Tendsto Î» atTop (ð“ 0))
  (hvar : Summable (fun n => |Î» (n+1) - Î» n|)) :
  Summable (fun n => Î» n * x n) := by sorry

import Mathlib

theorem dirichlet_bounded_variation (x lambda_seq : â„• â†’ â„)
  (h_bound : âˆƒ M, âˆ€ n, |âˆ‘ i in Finset.range (n+1), x i| â‰¤ M)
  (hÎ» : Tendsto lambda_seq atTop (ð“ 0))
  (hvar : Summable (fun n => |lambda_seq (n+1) - lambda_seq n|)) :
  Summable (fun n => lambda_seq n * x n) := by sorry

import Mathlib

open Finset

theorem dirichlet_bounded_variation (x lambda_seq : â„• â†’ â„)
  (h_bound : âˆƒ M, âˆ€ n, |âˆ‘ i : Finset (range (n+1)), x i| â‰¤ M)
  (hÎ» : Tendsto lambda_seq atTop (ð“ 0))

  Summable (fun n => lambda_seq n * x n) := by sorry

import Mathlib

theorem dirichlet_bounded_variation (x lambda_seq : â„• â†’ â„)
  (h_bound : âˆƒ M : â„, âˆ€ n : â„•, abs (Finset.sum (Finset.range (n+1)) fun i => x i) â‰¤ M)
  (hÎ» : Tendsto lambda_seq atTop (nhds 0))
  (hvar : Summable fun n => abs (lambda_seq (n+1) - lambda_seq n)) :

theorem dirichlet_bounded_variation (x lambda_seq : â„• â†’ â„)

  (h_tendsto : Tendsto (fun n => lambda_seq n) atTop (nhds 0))
  (hvar : Summable (fun n => abs (lambda_seq (n+1) - lambda_seq n))) :

import Mathlib

/- Dirichlet test for series with bounded partial sums and Î» of bounded variation.
   If the partial sums of x are bounded, Î»_n â†’ 0, and the series of absolute
   differences âˆ‘ |Î»_{n+1}-Î»_n| converges, then âˆ‘ Î»_n x_n converges. -/

theorem dirichlet_bounded_variation (x lambda_seq : â„• â†’ â„)
  (h_bound : âˆƒ M : â„, âˆ€ n : â„•, abs (Finset.sum (Finset.range (n+1)) (fun i => x i)) â‰¤ M)
  (h_tendsto : âˆ€ Îµ > 0, âˆƒ N, âˆ€ n, n â‰¥ N â†’ abs (lambda_seq n) â‰¤ Îµ)
  (hvar : Summable (fun n => abs (lambda_seq (n+1) - lambda_seq n))) :
  Summable (fun n => lambda_seq n * x n) := by sorry
